title: [EUW] LF ♀ Mid for Plat+ Team
body:
We are looking for a like-minded female midlaner to complete our freshly formed Women's Team.

[Trans-Women are included as long as they are registered as female. (We are sorry, for the inconvenience)
To Men or to Women, who are registered as male: There are certain All Female Tournaments with strict rules (Girl Gamer eSports Festival Cup, Female Open, etc) in which we'd like to compete. Therefore we cannot take you into our roster. Thank you very much for your understanding.]

>**YOUR QUALITIES**
You should ~~at least~~ have hit **Platinum in S7** (unboosted and not as an OTP) and shouldn't aim for less than mid Dia in S8.
Since we are currently playing around Bot and Jungle, you should be able to pressure midlane and know when to roam.
What matters to us most is your mentality.
You should be very competitive and a huge tryhard. *Giving up is not an option.*
Good Teamplay is dependent on good mood. That is why you should be able to keep a cool head and motivation up as well.
---
**TIME**
You should not only bring plenty of time, but be able to commit to a schedule. Being dependable and keeping appointments is vital.
---
**COACHING**
Coaching will be arranged. It will primarily cover team improvement and strategy.
The coaches job is to harshly criticize and correct us and show us how to advance. Praising and applauding would not bring us far, so you need to be able to appreciate criticism.
---
**NO-GO'S**
What is unwanted and will not be tolerated is boosting, gossip, drama, attention seeking, being fake, lying, passive aggressiveness, flaking out, toxic behaviour...
Teammates should be able to rely on each other. This cannot be dirtied by such unwanted features. A responsible, honest, good-natured interaction is needed not only ingame, but overall.

Peace,
Mary
